content.p: Engineering. Architecture. Design. Follow us on LinkedIn Welcome to the Faculty of Engineering Progress is rarely a straight line. Small steps. Missteps. Great strides. Giant leaps. Make them all here. We believe that great minds don't think alike. This is the place where you get the space, support, skills and connections to: Get ready to shape the real world. First UK engineering department to gain Athena Swan Gold Award High Fliers, The Graduate Market in 2024 Research Excellence Framework 2021 QS Graduate Employability Rankings 2022 QS top 100 World University Rankings by Subject 2024 “It's the total package of all the support I've received at University of Nottingham which has furthered my career and helped me in other aspects of my life. It has opened many opportunities and drastically improved my network and, as they say, your network is your net worth.” Abdulquadri Ademakinwa – Architecture and Environmental Design MArch (Digital Engineer, Laing O'Rourke and Bouygues Travaux Publics) We work with over 1,400 engineering employers locally, nationally and internationally, including: “We looked at which universities the students were coming from that were successful in joining our company and Nottingham was right at the top.” Peter Clarke – Global Analytical Sciences Director, Mondelez International Visit our campuses in person Read about engineering and architecture departments Find a course or PhD Multi-disciplinary research impact
